named-native-query.name: Message.getGlobalMessages
named-native-query.query: SELECT message_id, sender, content, address FROM message WHERE address IS NULL

named-native-query.name: Message.getPrivateMessages
named-native-query.query: SELECT message_id, sender, content, address FROM message WHERE (sender = ?2 AND address = ?1) OR (sender = ?1 AND address = ?2)
